attributes.action: Change the way primary school children are tested.
attributes.additional_details: SATs,tests, exams and other forms of these examinations do not define a child on their intellectual, knowledgable, creative, sporting and many other forms of capabilities but they do cause fear, anxiety and stress. Children as young as seven are subjected to these exams. As parents we are told they are to measure the schools progress but why are the childrens mental health being risked to measure the school as a whole.
attributes.background: Find alternative methods to examine how schools are performing, rather than subjecting them to tests. SATs can be changed for lighter less extensive measures.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

End all national tests in schools until GCSEs and A-Levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614946

Abolish all school exams and replace with teacher assessments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616014
